document_data.mainbody:
ramp was a warrior who fought for the Absolute during the late 15 century DR.
Kramp wore a crudely-made suit of metal armor that vaguely resembled goblin plate mail. He preferred to wield a goblin-sized greataxe in battle.
As of the , Kramp was among the Absolutes fervent warriors who remained poised to raid the Emerald Grove, once directed by True Soul Minthara Baenre.
